plotting module¶

plotting.plot_baseline(amount_df, total_df, cycle=2, capture=True, baseline_range=100, capture_parameter='Corrected_Flow_Right_filtered', title='100 points baseline', ymin=- 1, ymax=- 1)[source]¶

Plots the baseline of a given amount_df

Parameters

  • amount_df (pd.DataFrame) – A dataset creates by gas_methods.calculate_amount() that contains captured/released CO2 amount

  • total_df (pd.DataFrame) – A dataset creates by utils.merge_echem_gas_df() that contains gas and electrochem data.

  • cycle (int) – The cycle number to plot

  • capture (boolean) – If True, plot capture process and baseline. If False, plot release process and baseline.

  • baseline_range (int) – Number of extended points to plot the baseline. e.g. plot from baseline_range points before capture/release

  • capture_parameter (string) – The paramester used for calculating CO2 capture/release amount and baseline, usually ‘Corrected_Flow_Right_filtered’.

  • title (string) – The title for the output plot

  • ymin (float) – y-axis lower limit

  • ymax (float) – y-axis higher limit

Return type

None

Returns

A figure with capture/release process with baseline.

plotting.plot_baseline_selection(total_df, capture=True, cycle=5, time_change_period=10800, start=3500, end=6500, parameter='Corrected_Flow_Right', vertical_offset=10, ymin=0, ymax=60, title='Capture Baseline Selection')[source]¶

Stack different cycles’ capture or release period with a vertical offset value. Used for manual baseline selection

Parameters

  • total_df (pd.DataFrame) – A dataset created by utils.merge_echem_gas_df. It contains electrochemistry and gas flow data

  • capture (boolean) – True if capture periods are to be stacked. False if reduce periods are to be stacked.

  • cycle (int) – Number of cycles.

  • time_change_period (int) – The period in seconds that gas change takes place.

  • start (int) – Index of the start of the baseline

  • end (int) – Index of the end of the baseline

  • vertical_offset (float) – Offset values to separate each capture/outgas period on y-axis

  • ymin (float) – Minimum of y-axis

  • ymax (float) – Maximum of y-axis

  • title (string) – Title of the plot

Return type

None

Returns

Plot an image of the stacked baseline

plotting.plot_theoretical_dic_pH_TA(data_dict, x='TA', y='DIC', legend=True, xlim_low=None, xlim_high=None, ylim_low=None, ylim_high=None, save_name=None)[source]¶

Plot relationship among TA, DIC and pH. Can change x and y freely depending on the content to be plotted.

Parameters

  • x (string) – The array used for x-axis. Choose from “TA”,”DIC” and “pH”

  • y (string) – The array used for y-axis. Choose from “TA”, “DIC” and “pH”

  • legend (bool) – True if you want to show the legend

  • xlim_low (float) – low xlim for ax.set_xlim()

  • xlim_high (float) – high xlim for ax.set_xlim()

  • ylim_low (float) – low ylim for ax.set_ylim()

  • ylim_high (float) – high ylim for ax.set_ylim()

  • save_name (string) – file name of the figure to be saved.

Return type

None

Returns

Plot an image of DIC vs. pH (or other combinations of DIC, pH and TA)
